definition: A debt of blood must be paid in blood./Blood calls for blood.
pinyin: xue4 zhai4 yao4 yong4 xue4 lai2 chang2

definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)
